inout.indexing

Class BinaryIndexing<V extends java.lang.Number>

  • java.lang.Object
    • inout.indexing.Indexing
      • inout.indexing.BinaryIndexing<V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BinaryIndexing<V extends java.lang.Number>
extends Indexing
    Variant of Indexing class, where the IDs of the words and the frequency are stored in binary.
    Author:
    Dennis Ulmer
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BinaryIndexing()
      Dummy constructor
      BinaryIndexing(java.util.Map<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>,V> indexed_data, java.lang.String FREQS_IN_PATH, boolean zipped)
      Constructor to dump already indexed data
      BinaryIndexing(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,V> data, java.lang.String FREQS_IN_PATH, java.lang.String LEX_IN_PATH)
      Default constructor: Load (frequency) data, create indices and save them.
      BinaryIndexing(java.lang.String FREQS_IN_PATH, java.lang.String LEX_IN_PATH, boolean zipped)
      Constructor to load an Indexing from already computed data.
      BinaryIndexing(java.lang.String FREQS_IN_PATH, java.lang.String LEX_IN_PATH, boolean zipped, int threads)
      Constructor to load an Indexing from already computed data in a parallelized manner.

                      java.lang.String LEX_IN_PATH)
        Default constructor: Load (frequency) data, create indices and save them.
        Parameters:
        data - Data in form of Map<Integer, Integer> or Map<Integer, Double>
        FREQS_IN_PATH - Path to (frequency) data
        LEX_IN_PATH - Path to lexicon

        Parameters:
        FREQS_IN_PATH - Path to data
        LEX_IN_PATH - Path to lexicon
        zipped - Is the data in an archive?

      • BinaryIndexing

        public BinaryIndexing(java.lang.String FREQS_IN_PATH,
                      java.lang.String LEX_IN_PATH,
                      boolean zipped,
                      int threads)
        Constructor to load an Indexing from already computed data in a parallelized manner.
        Parameters:
        FREQS_IN_PATH - Path to data
        LEX_IN_PATH - Path to lexicon
        zipped - Is the data in an archive?
        threads - Number of threads to load data

      • BinaryIndexing

        public BinaryIndexing(java.util.Map<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>,V> indexed_data,
                      java.lang.String FREQS_IN_PATH,
                      boolean zipped)
        Constructor to dump already indexed data
        Parameters:
        indexed_data - Data in form of Map<Integer, Integer> or Map<Integer, Double>
        FREQS_IN_PATH - Path where data is to be dumped
        zipped - Should the data be zipped?
